item.title: Dharamshala Complete Itinerary: 6 Days from Gurgaon (30th April - 6th May 2025)
item.description:
Trip Overview

Duration: 6 nights, 7 days
Dates: 30th April - 6th May 2025
Group: 3 couples
Transportation: Laxmi Holidays bus, rented bikes, cabs
Base Locations: Thehr (4 nights) + Kareri Village (1 night)

item.title: Kareri Village Life: Nature Pools and Valley Views
item.description:
A Scenic Ride to Mountain Village Life

Day 5 marked a significant change in my Dharamshala experience - it was time to leave the comfort of our Thehr Airbnb and embrace a different kind of mountain adventure in Kareri village.

item.title: Palampur Chronicles: Tea Gardens and Ancient Temples
item.description:
Temples, Tea Estates, and Tranquil Gardens

Day 3 was dedicated to exploring the cultural and natural beauty around Dharamshala, with a special focus on Palampur - a charming town that perfectly blends agricultural heritage with ancient spirituality.

item.title: McLeodganj Adventures: Waterfalls, Ropeways, and Tibetan Culture
item.description:
McLeodganj Magic: My Day in Little Lhasa

Day 2 was all about immersing myself in the vibrant energy of McLeodganj. After the peaceful morning in Thehr, I was ready to experience the cultural heart of Tibetan Buddhism in India.

item.title: My Dharamshala Experience: Temples, Memorials, and Mountain Vibes
item.description:
Seeking Blessings and Honoring Heroes

Day 4 of my Dharamshala journey was dedicated to exploring the spiritual and cultural heart of the region. After three days of adventure and exploration, I wanted to connect with the deeper essence of this mountain town.
